desc: Carisma RC offers Affordable, Durable and Performance oriented Hobby Grade Radio Control Cars, Rally Cars, Formula One, Buggies, Scale Rigs, Rock Crawlers and Trucks. Both On and Off Road are catered for, as are all skill levels. Shop our online store for great RC Vehicles, Spares, Option Parts and Accessories.

layout.text:
Our latest release is a late 80's Japanese classic
that's as iconic as you can get. It's lines sum up
that era perfectly, it's no-nonsense approach
to 4x4 technology and its rugged construction
made it a firm favourite of Off Road enthusiasts
and laid the path for the models that came after it.
